Question

Just checked.

14 full clears, 3 failed Expert clears. Activities.report is not tracking my Playlist clears (the 10-wave ones), but I'll ballpark that I've done ten of those. 

Total Revenant Barons slain: 200.

If you cut out the 20 from the Playlist, that's 180 Revenant Barons slain in 14 full + 3 Expert, which results in 10.5 Revenant Barons per run.

Have you tried shooting them?

According to the CDC "Two-thirds of lesbian women (67.4%) reported having only female perpetrators of intimate partner violence" and the rest reported men. The number of lesbians they surveyed that reported being a victim of intimate partner violence was 43.8%. If you remove the 1/3rd that reported they faced violence from a man likely a past relationship before realizing they were lesbian), that brings you to around 29%. Which is actually lower than the 35% of heterosexual women who reported being a victim of intimate partner violence, 98.7% of which reported that it was a man who was doing the violence.

Kinda crazy to bring up the statistics on their violence rates when they're kind of actually better than straight relationships.

Social? It's a voice chat, it's voices from strangers coming from your headset, and you're a button press away from leaving if you don't want to be there. That's not social anxiety. People that have it struggle with being around people, and the key word is around. Real condition, but not over a voice chat, that's just creating a problem where it doesn't exist.
I’m wondering if there’s something you’re trying to say because after reading your comment a few times I’m still a little dumbfounded could you help me out and say it more clearly?

He means that your ancestors would be proud to know you conquered your tremendous fear of using your voice through a mic while some of them may have give their lives by talking through the powder, an amazing prowess that sure was needed to be shown on Reddit.

You don’t need to be a dick man, there’s plenty of others under this post that struggle with this same issue. Navigating social anxiety can be difficult and moments like this are a lot more meaningful than you think

Yes…socializing is talking in general lmao. You should speak with a therapist about your lack of empathy it might help you become I more understanding and overall better person. You sound like an awful human to deal with in person and over chat I bet you bully people over losing in trials 🤨
I guarantee your ancestors would be severely disappointed in you that you have access to something as amazing as internet and choose to use it just to insult some innocent dude on the internet.
Are you seriously trying to gatekeep social anxiety lmao? Why do you think "social" is used in "social media" then?

Yes, I bully people over a gamemode I don't play. Sorry, I only bully people on regular lost sectors. Try again pal. Are we socializing too? Is this it? Can I get scared over text? I might start sweating..don't know if I can handle this
I'm scared someone might follow me on instgram, nice definition of social. Anything is social. Even Reddit. Please don't reply, I have social anxiety, your words can make me feel nervous.
I don't think social anxiety is the mental deficiency you need to worry about
Yes? Social anxiety is a deficiency in ability to socialize without feeling stressed and anxious. There's nothing wrong with that. Your deficiency in common sense is another story.

So you're at a place with people around you and you can't leave, for some reason or another, so you have no choice but your anxiety quicks in. Nothing you can do.

Now, you're on a voice chat with other people, someone says something and your anxiety kicks in, you feel nervous, if only there was a way of immediately not...like I don't know, leave. Crazy concept, but it might work.

Yeah you definitely need to seek some professional help… especially at your grown ass age. Your lack of empathy for others is beyond me and shows a lack of good morals. Plus your parents clearly did not teach you the standard that if you have nothing nice to say don’t say anything at all. You are too old to act like a fcking child😬 big ick on your part bro

I wonder if people from third world countries working in call centers, because they need the money and can't find anything else can also have social anxiety over a voice chat..."Hey boss, I get nervous talking to people across the world with an headset, I don't think I can do it". I'm sure this isn't a first world problem. Grow up, if everybody had social anxiety over an online chat, the world woulnd't fucking move.

I used to struggle a lot heavily with the problem OP has, I also do it in real life around others. My problem I would say is overthinking, I used to use drugs to cope with it and they helped a lot. It was like I could fully concentrate on the game without thinking that people are judging me or looking down at me. It may also have to do with the fact I grew up online playing video games, not like decades ago where it was all in real life.

By now, I've improved my fears significantly but still have some issues. Also a recovering drug addiction.
